<h3 id="X17821">X(17821)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 1st EXCOSINE AND KOSNITA</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^2*(5*a^8-12*(b^2+c^2)*a^6+6*(b^2+c^2)^2*a^4+4*(b^4-c^4)*(b^2-c^2)*a^2-(3*b^4+2*b^2*c^2+3*c^4)*(b^2-c^2)^2)  :  :
<br>
<b>X(17821) = 6*X(3)-X(64) = 2*X(3)+3*X(154) = 4*X(3)+X(1498) = 7*X(3)-2*X(3357) = 3*X(3)+2*X(6759) = X(3)+4*X(10282) = 8*X(3)-3*X(10606) = X(3)-6*X(11202) = 11*X(3)-6*X(11204) = 9*X(3)+X(12315) = 11*X(3)-X(13093) = X(64)+9*X(154) = 2*X(64)+3*X(1498) = 7*X(64)-12*X(3357) = X(64)+4*X(6759) = X(64)-3*X(8567) = 4*X(64)-9*X(10606) = 3*X(64)+2*X(12315) = 11*X(64)-6*X(13093) = X(64)+6*X(14530) = 6*X(154)-X(1498) = 9*X(154)-4*X(6759) = 3*X(154)+X(8567) = 3*X(154)-8*X(10282) = 4*X(154)+X(10606) = X(154)+4*X(11202) = 11*X(154)+4*X(11204) = 3*X(154)-2*X(14530) = 7*X(1498)+8*X(3357) = 3*X(1498)-8*X(6759) = X(1498)+2*X(8567) = X(1498)-16*X(10282) = 2*X(1498)+3*X(10606) = 9*X(1498)-4*X(12315) = 11*X(1498)+4*X(13093) = X(1498)-4*X(14530) = 3*X(3357)+7*X(6759) = 4*X(3357)-7*X(8567) = X(3357)+14*X(10282) = 22*X(3357)-7*X(13093) = 2*X(3357)+7*X(14530) = 4*X(6759)+3*X(8567) = X(6759)-6*X(10282) = X(6759)+9*X(11202) = 11*X(6759)+9*X(11204) = 6*X(6759)-X(12315) = 2*X(6759)-3*X(14530) = X(8567)+8*X(10282)</b>
<p>X(17821) lies on these lines: {3,64}, {4,10192}, {5,17845}, {6,24}, {16,17826}, {20,11064}, {22,11449}, {25,11424}, {26,13391}, {35,2192}, {36,221}, {110,17835}, {140,1853}, {155,1658}, {156,12163}, {159,5085}, {161,6642}, {182,9924}, {184,3515}, {185,15750}, {186,1181}, {206,1092}, {371,17820}, {372,17819}, {376,2883}, {378,15811}, {389,17809}, {394,7488}, {511,16195}, {548,5878}, {549,14216}, {550,5895}, {575,17813}, {578,3517}, {631,1503}, {1075,15576}, {1147,14070}, {1152,10533}, {1216,6293}, {1495,1593}, {1511,10117}, {1598,11430}, {1614,1620}, {1660,10984}, {1854,3612}, {1971,5013}, {2777,15040}, {2781,15034}, {2935,15035}, {3066,13434}, {3089,15448}, {3147,6146}, {3197,10902}, {3518,10982}, {3522,15311}, {3523,6247}, {3524,6696}, {3526,10182}, {3528,5656}, {3529,5893}, {3532,11270}, {3579,7973}, {3592,11242}, {3594,11241}, {4232,15873}, {5217,10535}, {5706,7501}, {5786,7531}, {5944,6644}, {6001,7987}, {6225,10304}, {6353,12241}, {6409,12970}, {6776,15585}, {6815,13394}, {7387,12038}, {7575,12161}, {8549,10541}, {9703,10274}, {9714,13352}, {9909,13346}, {9932,17836}, {10020,14852}, {10201,12293}, {10249,15581}, {10298,11441}, {11381,11410}, {11427,11745}, {11598,15036}, {12107,16266}, {12118,13383}, {12307,17824}, {12324,15717}, {12893,17838}, {12974,17840}, {12975,17843}, {13171,17701}, {13289,17847}, {13293,17812}</p>
<p>
X(17821) = midpoint of X(3) and X(14530)<br>
X(17821) = X(8567) of ABC-X3 reflections triangle<br>X(17821) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (3, 154, 1498), (3, 1498, 10606), (3, 6759, 64), (3, 8780, 5907), (3, 10282, 154), (3, 13093, 11204), (24, 15577, 2917), (25, 13367, 11425), (54, 2917, 17846), (64, 154, 6759), (64, 6759, 1498), (140, 9833, 1853), (184, 3515, 9786), (8567, 14530, 1498), (10282, 11202, 3)<br></p>
